nodes.text: A male Sanyassan with long black hair once assaulted the crew of a StarSpeeder 3000 transport of the Star Tours travel agency. Along with a fellow criminal of the same species, he entered a hangar on Endor, where the Star Tours spacecraft had landed. While his colleague threatened the crewmen, the long-haired Sanyassan kept a lookout, armed with a blaster pistol.
